name: Alien Life Core
desc:
Breacher Primus's Core.

There is no way to exterminate this life form. One reduced to nothing but its core will resurrect the next day or in decades. Luckily, it is neither aggressive nor intelligent, so Fontainians can just keep their distance.

value.text:
Crafted
Dropped by Lv. 60+ Breacher Primuses

customize.name: Large Shatterstone Breacher Primus
customize.desc:
A strange life form that mostly appears in Elynas.

Melusines perceive Breacher Primuses as harmless creatures, and many even find them completely adorable.

The visual perception of Melusines is very different from humans.

customize.name: Shatterstone Breacher Primus
customize.desc:
A strange life form that mostly appears in Elynas.

Receives a powerful shock from encountering ousia or pneuma energy, and thus Breacher Primuses can be driven away using this relatively nonaggressive and noninvasive means.

customize.name: Large Overgrown Breacher Primus
customize.desc:
A strange life form that mostly appears in Elynas.

The nature of a Breacher Primus defies known categories: they are not animals, plants, Shroom-Kin, nor Elementals. The debate among scholars of Sumeru never formally reached a consensus on just what it is, until it was finally banned as a research topic. The reason is that based on the current system of knowledge, this problem is like "the definitions prescribed by language and the true nature of things," and it is impossible to have a meaningful, final answer.

customize.name: Overgrown Breacher Primus
customize.desc:
A strange life form that mostly appears in Elynas.

In Fontaine, the earliest recorded observations of a Breacher Primus appeared shortly after the cataclysm. Records from the time show instances of Breacher Primuses both attacking and protecting humans.

customize.name: Alien Life Core
customize.desc:
Breacher Primus's Core.

There is no way to exterminate this life form. One reduced to nothing but its core will resurrect the next day or in decades. Luckily, it is neither aggressive nor intelligent, so Fontainians can just keep their distance.

customize.name: Masterless Starglitter
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Starglitter of destiny. Perhaps it can light up other corners of the universe.

customize.name: Alien Life Core
customize.desc:
Breacher Primus's Core.

There is no way to exterminate this life form. One reduced to nothing but its core will resurrect the next day or in decades. Luckily, it is neither aggressive nor intelligent, so Fontainians can just keep their distance.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Foreign Synapse
customize.desc:
A shard left by Breacher Primus.

This strange life form originates in Elynas and inhabits the area.

customize.name: Rift Core
customize.desc:
A shard left by Breacher Primus.

It bears no resemblance to any other known form of life in the world.

customize.name: Foreign Synapse
customize.desc:
A shard left by Breacher Primus.

This strange life form originates in Elynas and inhabits the area.
